import axios from'axios';import{GET_PROFILE,GET_PROFILES,PROFILE_LOADING,CLEAR_CURRENT_PROFILE,GET_ERRORS,SET_CURRENT_USER}from"./types";// Get Current Profile
export var getCurrentProfile=function getCurrentProfile(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setProfileLoading());axios.get('/api/profile').then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_PROFILE,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_PROFILE,payload:{}});});};};// Get Profile By Handle
export var getProfileByHandle=function getProfileByHandle(handle){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setProfileLoading());axios.get("/api/profile/handle/".concat(handle)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_PROFILE,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_PROFILE,payload:null});});};};// Get All Profiles
export var getProfiles=function getProfiles(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setProfileLoading());axios.get('/api/profile/all').then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_PROFILES,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_PROFILES,payload:null});});};};// Create Profile
export var createProfile=function createProfile(profileData,history){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/api/profile',profileData).then(function(res){return history.push('/dashboard');}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};// Add Experience
export var addExperience=function addExperience(expData,history){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/api/profile/experience',expData).then(function(res){return history.push('dashboard');}).catch(function(err){dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};// Add Education
export var addEducation=function addEducation(eduData,history){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/api/profile/education',eduData).then(function(res){return history.push('dashboard');}).catch(function(err){dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};// Delete Experience
export var deleteExperience=function deleteExperience(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/profile/experience/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_PROFILE,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};// Delete Education
export var deleteEducation=function deleteEducation(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/profile/education/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_PROFILE,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});};};// Delete account & profile
export var deleteAccount=function deleteAccount(){return function(dispatch){if(window.confirm('Are you sure? This can NOT be undone!')){axios.delete('/api/profile').then(function(res){return dispatch({type:SET_CURRENT_USER,payload:{}});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_ERRORS,payload:err.response.data});});}};};// Profile Loading
export var setProfileLoading=function setProfileLoading(){return{type:PROFILE_LOADING};};// Clear Current Profile
export var clearCurrentProfile=function clearCurrentProfile(){return{type:CLEAR_CURRENT_PROFILE};};
